Without Prejudice

 

Dear Sujith,

 

Reference is made to subject claim, and we are pleased to enclosed herewith the discharge receipt for AED 15,366.00 as full and final payment of the subject claim.

 

Therefore, kindly forward us the same duly signed and stamp to proceed further. 

 

ALSO, KINDLY REFER BELOW INSTRUCTION FOR THE CLAIM SETTLEMENT.

 

 

FOR DISCHARGE RECEIPT 

 

*	To make arrangement to provide the D/R

 

FOR BANK TRANSFER  

 

*	Bank details of the payee on the Letter head of the Bank  ( Bank account confirmation letter) / Copy of the Bank statement (only the header where the Bank details are visible)
*	Trade License copy of the Insured

 

Thank you.

Please note that I will be transitioning out of my current role, with my last working day being May 09, 2025. Moving forward, I kindly request that you include the following team members in all future communications related to claims:

Lokesh Rao (Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com> ), Ayodhya Perera (Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com> ), Akila Sanjeewa (Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com> ) 

Best Regards,

 

Nadeesha Vithanage | Insurance Assistant - Non Motor Claims

Dear Sujith,

 

Reference is made to subject claim, and we are pleased to enclosed herewith the discharge receipt for AED 15,366.00 as full and final payment of the subject claim.

 

Therefore, kindly forward us the same duly signed and stamp to proceed further. 

 

ALSO, KINDLY REFER BELOW INSTRUCTION FOR THE CLAIM SETTLEMENT.

 

 

FOR DISCHARGE RECEIPT 

 

*	To make arrangement to provide the D/R

 

FOR BANK TRANSFER  

 

*	Bank details of the payee on the Letter head of the Bank  ( Bank account confirmation letter) / Copy of the Bank statement (only the header where the Bank details are visible)
*	Trade License copy of the Insured

 

Thank you.

Please note that I will be transitioning out of my current role, with my last working day being May 09, 2025. Moving forward, I kindly request that you include the following team members in all future communications related to claims:

Lokesh Rao (Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com> ), Ayodhya Perera (Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com> ), Akila Sanjeewa (Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com> )

Nadeesha Vithanage | Insurance Assistant - Non Motor Claims

Dear Sujith,

 

Reference is made to subject claim, and we are pleased to enclosed herewith the discharge receipt for AED 15,366.00 as full and final payment of the subject claim.

 

Therefore, kindly forward us the same duly signed and stamp to proceed further. 

 

ALSO, KINDLY REFER BELOW INSTRUCTION FOR THE CLAIM SETTLEMENT.

 

 

FOR DISCHARGE RECEIPT 

 

*	To make arrangement to provide the D/R

 

FOR BANK TRANSFER  

 

*	Bank details of the payee on the Letter head of the Bank  ( Bank account confirmation letter) / Copy of the Bank statement (only the header where the Bank details are visible)
*	Trade License copy of the Insured

 

Thank you.

Please note that I will be transitioning out of my current role, with my last working day being May 09, 2025. Moving forward, I kindly request that you include the following team members in all future communications related to claims:

Lokesh Rao (Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com> ), Ayodhya Perera (Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com> ), Akila Sanjeewa (Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com> ) 

Best Regards,

 

Nadeesha Vithanage | Insurance Assistant - Non Motor Claims

Without Prejudice

 

Dear Sujith,

 

Reference is made to subject claim, and we are pleased to enclosed herewith the discharge receipt for AED 15,366.00 as full and final payment of the subject claim.

 

Therefore, kindly forward us the same duly signed and stamp to proceed further. 

 

ALSO, KINDLY REFER BELOW INSTRUCTION FOR THE CLAIM SETTLEMENT.

 

 

FOR DISCHARGE RECEIPT 

 

*	To make arrangement to provide the D/R

 

FOR BANK TRANSFER  

 

*	Bank details of the payee on the Letter head of the Bank  ( Bank account confirmation letter) / Copy of the Bank statement (only the header where the Bank details are visible)
*	Trade License copy of the Insured

 

Thank you.

Please note that I will be transitioning out of my current role, with my last working day being May 09, 2025. Moving forward, I kindly request that you include the following team members in all future communications related to claims:

Lokesh Rao (Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com> ), Ayodhya Perera (Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com> ), Akila Sanjeewa (Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com> ) 

Best Regards,

 

Nadeesha Vithanage | Insurance Assistant - Non Motor Claims

Dear Sujith,

 

Reference is made to subject claim, and we are pleased to enclosed herewith the discharge receipt for AED 15,366.00 as full and final payment of the subject claim.

 

Therefore, kindly forward us the same duly signed and stamp to proceed further. 

 

ALSO, KINDLY REFER BELOW INSTRUCTION FOR THE CLAIM SETTLEMENT.

 

 

FOR DISCHARGE RECEIPT 

 

*	To make arrangement to provide the D/R

 

FOR BANK TRANSFER  

 

*	Bank details of the payee on the Letter head of the Bank  ( Bank account confirmation letter) / Copy of the Bank statement (only the header where the Bank details are visible)
*	Trade License copy of the Insured

 

Thank you.

Please note that I will be transitioning out of my current role, with my last working day being May 09, 2025. Moving forward, I kindly request that you include the following team members in all future communications related to claims:

Lokesh Rao (Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Lokesh.Rao@alfuttaim.com> ), Ayodhya Perera (Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Ayodhya.Perera@alfuttaim.com> ), Akila Sanjeewa (Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com <mailto:Akila.Sanjeewa@alfuttaim.com> ) 

Best Regards,

 

Nadeesha Vithanage | Insurance Assistant - Non Motor Claims
